message: The sunset in the mountains is truly incredible. Clean air, the beauty of nature. Silence... What will You do?
rightAnswer: Continue your journey under cover of night
wrongAnswer: Spend a few hours by the campfire, enjoying the views
consequencesOfWrongChoices: Edenia guards noticed the fire and detained You. You were transferred to the sorting station. You tried to escape, but failed. The next day You died from numerous bodily injuries, which, according to the official version, were self-inflicted...
